column4: I've created a user. How do I make him access my external drive? I can't seem to chmod /media/drivename?
it 's a hd in three partitions, filesystem, music and movies
it can access the file system
when I try to cd into the other partitions it says I'm not allowed to do that
my new user isn't in the sudo file
have you tried to include your new user in the sudoers list?
but I'm not sure what I need to change permissions on
tried the devices in /media/, but might be totally off track
hotkeys & the 'fn' key do not work in my recently bought HP G62, anyone?
yes, i was talking to you xdd
